name: HSP_ACCT_BLD_REV
description: This table contains blood review information from the Hospital Accounts Receivable (HAR) master file.

columns.name: HSP_ACCOUNT_ID
columns.description: This column stores the unique identifier for the hospital account with associated blood review information.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number in the results of a query. Each blood review will have its own line number.

columns.name: BLD_RVW_UNITS
columns.description: Number of blood units used for the blood review associated with the hospital account.

columns.name: BLD_RVW_DT
columns.description: Date of blood review associated with hospital account.

columns.name: BLD_RVW_PHYS_ID
columns.description: This column stores the unique identifier for the physician who did the blood review associated with the hospital account.

columns.name: BLD_RVW_COMP_C_NAME
columns.description: This column stores the blood component of the blood review associated with the hospital account. e.g., Cryoprecipitate, Fresh frozen plasma, Platelets, Packed red blood cells, etc.

columns.name: BR_CRIT_MET_C_NAME
columns.description: Were the criteria of the blood review associated with the hospital account met?  1-yes 2-no 3-N/A
